configuration.iflow.skillDataSource.titl: Data source for searching skills online
configuration.iflow.skillDataSource.mark:
Data source for searching skills online:
- **GitHub**: Search skills from GitHub repositories
- **SkillMap**: Search skills from [SkillMap marketplace](https://skillmaps.net/market) (verified skills)
